018package org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type;
019
020import static java.util.Arrays.stream;
021import static java.util.Locale.ROOT;
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
025
026import org.apiguardian.api.API;
027import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
028import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils;
029
030/**
031 *  SVG allows different units for some attributes; this class defines these
032 *  units and the transformations into Strings for those units.
033 *
034 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
035 *  @version $Id: SVGUnit.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $
036 *  @since 0.0.5
037 *
038 *  @UMLGraph.link
039 */
040@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: SVGUnit.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $" )
041@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
042public enum SVGUnit
043{
044        /*------------------*\
045    ====** Enum Declaration **=================================================
046        \*------------------*/
047    /**
048     *  No explicit unit; usually this is equivalent to
049     *  {@link #PIXEL}.
050     */
051    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
052    NONE( EMPTY_STRING ),
053
054    /**
055     *  Centimeters.
056     */
057    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
058    CENTIMETER( "cm" ),
059
060    /**
061     *  Unit based on the width of the current font; usually the width of the
062     *  letter 'm' in this font.
063     */
064    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
065    EM( "em" ),
066
067    /**
068     *  Unit based on the current x-height.
069     */
070    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
071    EX( "ex" ),
072
073    /**
074     *  Inch.
075     */
076    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
077    INCH( "in" ),
078
079    /**
080     *  Millimeters.
081     */
082    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
083    MILLIMETER( "mm" ),
084
085    /**
086     *  Percent.
087     */
088    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
089    PERCENT( "%" ),
090
091    /**
092     *  Picas.
093     */
094    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
095    PICA( "pc" ),
096
097    /**
098     *  Pixels.
099     */
100    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
101    PIXEL( "px" ),
102
103    /**
104     *  Points.
105     */
106    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
107    POINT( "pt" );
108
109        /*------------*\
110    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
111        \*------------*/
112    /**
113     *  The format string for the unit for floating point values.
114     */
115    private final String m_FloatingPointFormat;
116
117    /**
118     *  The format string for the unit for integer values.
119     */
120    private final String m_IntegerFormat;
121
122    /**
123     *  The unit identifier.
124     */
125    private final String m_Unit;
126
127        /*--------------*\
128    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
129        \*--------------*/
130    /**
131     *  Creates a new {@code SVGUnit} instance.
132     *
133     *  @param  identifier  The unit identifier.
134     */
135    private SVGUnit( final String identifier )
136    {
137        m_Unit = identifier;
138        if( "%".equals( m_Unit ) )
139        {
140            m_FloatingPointFormat = "%1.3f%%";
141            m_IntegerFormat = "%d%%";
142        }
143        else
144        {
145            m_FloatingPointFormat = "%1.3f" + m_Unit;
146            m_IntegerFormat = "%d" + m_Unit;
147        }
148    }   //  SVGUnit()
149
150        /*---------*\
151    ====** Methods **==========================================================
152        \*---------*/
153    /**
154     *  Formats the given type for this unit.
155     *
156     *  @param  value   The type.
157     *  @return The formatted type.
158     */
159    public final String format( final long value ) { return StringUtils.format( ROOT, m_IntegerFormat, value ); }
160
161    /**
162     *  Formats the given type for this unit.
163     *
164     *  @param  value   The type.
165     *  @return The formatted type.
166     */
167    public final String format( final double value ) { return StringUtils.format( ROOT, m_FloatingPointFormat, value ); }
168
169    /**
170     *  Returns the {@code SVGUnit} instance for the given unit String.
171     *
172     *  @param  unit    The unit String.
173     *  @return The {@code SVGUnit} for the given unit.
174     */
175    @SuppressWarnings( "AccessingNonPublicFieldOfAnotherObject" )
176    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
177    public static final SVGUnit valueForUnit( final String unit )
178    {
179        requireNonNullArgument( unit, "unit" );
180        final var retValue = stream( values() ).filter( v -> v.m_Unit.equalsIgnoreCase( unit ) ).findAny().orElseThrow( () -> new IllegalArgumentException( unit ) );
181
182        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
183        return retValue;
184    }   //  valueForUnit()
185
186    /**
187     *  {@inheritDoc}
188     */
189    @Override
190    public final String toString() { return m_Unit; }
191}
192//  enum SVGUnit
193
194/*
195 *  End of File
196 */
